com.googlecode.aluminumproject.configuration
Interface Configuration

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultConfiguration
public interface Configuration

Contains all dynamic parts of the template engine.

A configuration consists of configuration elements. Upon creation, a configuration is required to initialise the elements it consists of. Similarly, when a configuration is closed, it should disable its elements.

Trying to use a configuration or its configuration elements after it has been closed could result in strange behaviour.

          Closes this configuration.

Closes this configuration.

Throws:
